title: Deva Curl Light Defining Gel (Formerly Angel) 32oz
description: A lightweight, moisturizing curl defining gel for maximum frizz prevention that holds without feeling stiff or sticky.

title: Devacurl Spray Gel, 8.0 Fluid Ounce
description: This alcohol free, non-flaking spray gel provides maximum curl definition, lift and a crunch free hold. Spray on wet or dry curls for extra hold. Extra hold and curl retention Moisturizes, enhances and re-activates curls Enhances waves while taming frizz

title: Devacurl Ultra Defining Gel, 32.0 Fluid Ounce
description: A nourishing and deﬁning gel Offers strong hold to form curls with no sticky or stiff sensation. Formulated with extracts of Oat, Soy and Wheat Amino Acid Creates a moisture-protective veil to intensify curls Penetrates instantly when applied to wet hair
